title: Change the hostname or IP
content:
If the hostname/IP has changed in OO Workflow Designer, you must manually update this hostname/IP address.

  1. If you are using an OO Workflow Designer certificate, generate a new certificate with the new FQDN.

    It's not recommended to use the IP address.

    You must also replace the certificate in the OO Workflow Designer keystore.

  2. Restart OO Workflow Designer.
